HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Changed fish butchering to new quicker bills "Clean Fish" and "Clean 8 Fish".|img:Things/Item/Corpse/Fish_a,Things/Item/Meat/FishMeat|caption:now faster.
Adjusted fishing to be slightly slower (to match mod description).|Made bridges from RF - Bridges mod and springs from Nature's Pretty Sweet mod be respected for water distances calculations.
Added support for Tribal Essentials and Medieval Times mods' butchering stations.
New butcher spot |img:Things/Building/Production/ButcherSpot| can now clean fish.
Added audio support for Mac / Linux.

Added configuration of |img:Things/Building/Production/FishingSpot|fishing spot min distances, and |img:Mote/FishingRod/RodEast|fishing work cost to mod settings.\n\nEdit these under Options -> Mod Settings.

Fix for |img:Things/Item/Meat/FishMeat|fish rotting in RimFridge's |img:Things/Building/Misc/TempControl/Cooler_north|coolers (and maybe other situations?).\n\nThanks mrStorrs for finding a fix, as it doesn't occur for all user setups!
Fishing made more mod friendly. Now adding a "Fishable" tag to terrain types will allow for fishing there.
Improved graphics |img:Things/Item/Corpse/Fish_a,Things/Item/Corpse/Fish_b,Things/Item/Meat/FishMeat|and russian translations courtesy of Daniledman. спасибо
